message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it would be very valuable to your work, and this is a very competitive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to go beyond $12,000 for this product. Could we perhaps find a mutually agreeable price within this range?
